revised_title: Cavendish's Response to Kirwan on Air and Phlogiston
tldr: In this article, Henry Cavendish responds to Mr. Kirwan's paper on air and phlogiston. Cavendish discusses various experiments and findings related to the composition of air, the generation of fixed air, and the role of phlogiston in chemical reactions. He presents his arguments and evidence to support his views on the phlogiston theory and the nature of air.
